  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.6GHz dual core
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Pretty much anything that can deal with OpenGL ES
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is really light-weight, I'm pretty sure even the above system requirements are overkill.
